name: undeclared
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not publicly admitted to be something or to exist, or not yet decided : The report did not mention inspections at undeclared nuclear sites. It is illegal to bring undeclared cash into the country. "The gap has closed between Democrats and Republicans, and that makes the undeclared voters more important than ever," she said.
More examplesFewer examplesThey are conducting a voluntary disclosure initiative for people who need to report previously undeclared income.The coach was seized because more than half of the passengers were carrying undeclared goods.This undeclared war goes largely unreported by the media.Her case is proof that undeclared ingredients in some dietary supplements can cause serious psychiatric problems.This clearly permits significant amounts of money to go undeclared.
